description: Deletes a recommendation template. This is a destructive action that can't be undone.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: Used for an idempotency token. A client token is a unique, case-sensitive string of up to 64 ASCII characters. You should not reuse the same client token for other API requests. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: recommendationTemplateArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for a recommendation template.

nested_items.name: recommendationTemplateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for a recommendation template.
